Miscellaneous Highlights: Hoskins hit a solo home run against Nola in the fifth inning, tying the game.
Others: Nola mentioned that he has seen Hoskins hit curveballs out many times.
Hoskins left the Phillies due to Bryce Harper moving to first base and the lack of a DH spot.
Despite the current rivalry, Nola expressed respect for Hoskins, indicating a mutual admiration between the former teammates.
